todos.title: 1A. Did you get out of your comfort zone and talk to people you don't know?
1B. Were you able to validate your end users or buyers?
2C. Were you able to perform three to five validation interviews.
2D. Did you shadow customers as they performed tasks related to the validation?
2E. Did you perform competitor usability test?
2F. Did you let them struggle when you asked them how to do a process?
2G. Did you try to sell something?
3A. Did you ask the two magic questions (biggest problem w/ ____, why, why why?
3B. Did you validate them with a prepared script, questions, and even visualizations?
3C. Did you avoid bias (did you ask questions before discussing your idea)?
3D. Did you give your respondents permission to be candid?
3E. Did you keep all questions to what they don't like or have done before?
3F. Did you dig deep to identify root causes of their problems?
3G. Did you throw in random questions to prevent bias?
3H. Did you clearly and without a doubt prove one of your biggest unknowns?
3I. Did you take time to thank them the next day?
